## WorkspaceSvg.addTopBlock() method

Adds a block to the list of top blocks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addTopBlock(block: Block): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | Block to add. |
